text: hings were Humanity’s Heritage and common knowledge. The Emerald Covenant teachings were once the core, heart and soul of every religion. These teachings belong to the Christian, the Muslim, the Jew, the Hindu, the Buddhist, the Tribal Shaman....to everyone. This was true in the days before the “Falcon,” the “Phoenix,” the “Serpent,” the “Dragon” and the “Dove” laid their territorial claim on Earth and attempted to possess humanity’s soul. These were the Ancient of Days, the Days of Innocence, when Angelic Humans lived in peace and joyful union with all other kingdoms in “God’s House of Many ____________________________ 23.
